<span typeof="mw:File"><a href="/wiki/File:James_Lovell_(3x4_cropped).jpg" class="mw-file-description" title="Jim Lovell in 1969"><img alt="Jim Lovell in 1969" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/24/James_Lovell_%283x4_cropped%29.jpg/250px-James_Lovell_%283x4_cropped%29.jpg" decoding="async" width="121" height="161" class="mw-file-element" data-file-width="2219" data-file-height="2957"></a></span><div class="thumbcaption" style="padding: 0.25em 0; word-wrap: break-word; text-align: left;">Jim Lovell in 1969</div></div>

<ul><li>American astronaut <b><a href="/wiki/Jim_Lovell" title="Jim Lovell">Jim Lovell</a></b> <i>(pictured)</i> dies at the <span class="nowrap">age of 97</span>.</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/2025_Ghanaian_Air_Force_Z-9_helicopter_crash" title="2025 Ghanaian Air Force Z-9 helicopter crash">A helicopter crashes</a></b> in <a href="/wiki/Ashanti_Region" title="Ashanti Region">Ashanti Region</a>, Ghana, killing all on board, including two current ministers (<a href="/wiki/Edward_Omane_Boamah" title="Edward Omane Boamah">Edward Omane Boamah</a> and <a href="/wiki/Ibrahim_Murtala_Muhammed" title="Ibrahim Murtala Muhammed">Ibrahim Murtala Muhammed</a>).</li>
<li>In cycling, <a href="/wiki/Pauline_Ferrand-Pr%C3%A9vot" title="Pauline Ferrand-Prvot">Pauline Ferrand-Prvot</a> wins <b><a href="/wiki/2025_Tour_de_France_Femmes" title="2025 Tour de France Femmes">the Tour de France Femmes</a></b>.</li>
<li>In association football, <a href="/wiki/2025_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica_Femenina" title="2025 Copa Amrica Femenina">the Copa Amrica Femenina</a> concludes with <a href="/wiki/Brazil_women%27s_national_football_team" title="Brazil women's national football team">Brazil</a> defeating <a href="/wiki/Colombia_women%27s_national_football_team" title="Colombia women's national football team">Colombia</a> in <b><a href="/wiki/2025_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica_Femenina_final" title="2025 Copa Amrica Femenina final">the final</a></b>.</li></ul>

<div role="region" aria-label="August 11" id="2025_August_11" class="current-events-main vevent">
    <div class="current-events-heading plainlinks">
        <div class="current-events-title" role="heading"><span class="summary">August 11, 2025<span style="display: none;"> (<span class="bday dtstart published updated itvstart">2025-08-11</span>)</span> (Monday)</span>
        </div>
        <ul class="current-events-navbar editlink noprint"><li><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Portal:Current_events/2025_August_11&action=edit&editintro=Portal:Current_events/Edit_instructions">edit</a></li><li><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Portal:Current_events/2025_August_11&action=history">history</a></li><li><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Portal:Current_events/2025_August_11&action=watch">watch</a></li>
        </ul>
    </div>
    <div class="current-events-content description">
<ul><li class="mw-empty-elt"></li></ul></div></div></div>
<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1248507241"><div class="current-events">
<div role="region" aria-label="August 10" id="2025_August_10" class="current-events-main vevent">
    <div class="current-events-heading plainlinks">
        <div class="current-events-title" role="heading"><span class="summary">August 10, 2025<span style="display: none;"> (<span class="bday dtstart published updated itvstart">2025-08-10</span>)</span> (Sunday)</span>
        </div>
        <ul class="current-events-navbar editlink noprint"><li><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Portal:Current_events/2025_August_10&action=edit&editintro=Portal:Current_events/Edit_instructions">edit</a></li><li><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Portal:Current_events/2025_August_10&action=history">history</a></li><li><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Portal:Current_events/2025_August_10&action=watch">watch</a></li>
        </ul>
    </div>
    <div class="current-events-content description">
<p><b>Armed conflicts and attacks</b>
</p>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Gaza_war" title="Gaza war">Gaza war</a>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Israeli_invasion_of_the_Gaza_Strip" title="Israeli invasion of the Gaza Strip">Israeli invasion of the Gaza Strip</a>
<ul><li>Seven people <a href="/wiki/Casualties_of_the_Gaza_war" title="Casualties of the Gaza war">are killed</a>, including five <a href="/wiki/Al_Jazeera" class="mw-redirect" title="Al Jazeera">Al Jazeera</a> journalists and cameramen in an <a href="/wiki/Israel_Defense_Forces" title="Israel Defense Forces">Israeli</a> strike near the <a href="/wiki/Al-Shifa_Hospital" title="Al-Shifa Hospital">Al-Shifa Hospital</a> in <a href="/wiki/Gaza_City" title="Gaza City">Gaza City</a>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/articles/ceqyyrp3yq9o">(BBC News)</a> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2025/8/10/al-jazeera-journalist-anas-al-sharif-killed-in-israeli-attack-in-gaza-city">(Al Jazeera)</a></li></ul></li></ul></li></ul>
<p><b>Disasters and accidents</b>
</p>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/2025_Bal%C4%B1kesir_earthquake" title="2025 Balkesir earthquake">2025 Balkesir earthquake</a>
<ul><li>A <a href="/wiki/Seismic_magnitude_scales#Mww" title="Seismic magnitude scales"><style data-mw-deduplicate="TemplateStyles:r1038841319">.mw-parser-output .tooltip-dotted{border-bottom:1px dotted;cursor:help}</style><span class="rt-commentedText tooltip" title="Mw mag. from W-phase">M<sub>ww</sub></span></a> 6.1 earthquake strikes western <a href="/wiki/Turkey" title="Turkey">Turkey</a>, killing one person, injuring 35 others, trapping several and causing at least 16 building and two <a href="/wiki/Mosque" title="Mosque">mosque</a> <a href="/wiki/Minaret" title="Minaret">minaret</a> collapses in <a href="/wiki/Bal%C4%B1kesir_Province" title="Balkesir Province">Balkesir Province</a> and <a href="/wiki/Manisa" title="Manisa">Manisa</a>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.cnnturk.com/turkiye/son-dakika-istanbulda-hissedilen-deprem-meydana-geldi-2321715#post-5">(CNN Turkiye)</a> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.trthaber.com/haber/gundem/balikesirde-61-buyuklugunde-deprem-916546.html">(TRT Haber)</a></li></ul></li>
<li>Six people are killed, including four children, in a two-alarm fire at a house in <a href="/wiki/Waldorf,_Maryland" title="Waldorf, Maryland">Waldorf</a>, <a href="/wiki/Maryland" title="Maryland">Maryland</a>, United States. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.cbsnews.com/baltimore/news/house-firee-maryland-waldorf-charles-fatal/">(WJZ-TV)</a></li>
<li>Four people are killed and sixteen others are injured due to a <a href="/wiki/Vehicle_collision" class="mw-redirect" title="Vehicle collision">vehicle collision</a> on the <a href="/wiki/List_of_federal_highways_in_Brazil" title="List of federal highways in Brazil">BR-452</a> highway in <a href="/wiki/Uberl%C3%A2ndia" title="Uberlndia">Uberlndia</a>, <a href="/wiki/Minas_Gerais" title="Minas Gerais">Minas Gerais</a>, <a href="/wiki/Brazil" title="Brazil">Brazil</a>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://g1.globo.com/mg/triangulo-mineiro/noticia/2025/08/10/quatro-pessoas-morrem-e-16-ficam-feridas-em-batida-entre-carro-e-van-na-br-452-em-uberlandia.ghtml?UTM_SOURCE=copiar-url&UTM_MEDIUM=share-bar-app&UTM_CAMPAIGN=materias&UTM_TERM=app-webview">(G1 Globo)</a></li>
<li>More than 600 pilgrims in <a href="/wiki/Baghdad" title="Baghdad">Baghdad</a>, <a href="/wiki/Iraq" title="Iraq">Iraq</a>, are hospitalised with respiratory problems after inhaling chlorine as the result of a leak at a water treatment station. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.msn.com/en-gb/health/other/over-600-hospitalised-due-to-chlorine-gas-leak-in-iraq/ar-AA1KfTc3?ocid=msedgntp&pc=U531&cvid=68990b0f35f54190a9a62049e78b1b37&ei=42">(MSN)</a></li></ul>
<p><b>International relations</b>
</p>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Russia%E2%80%93United_States_relations" title="RussiaUnited States relations">RussiaUnited States relations</a>, <a href="/wiki/Peace_negotiations_in_the_Russian_invasion_of_Ukraine" title="Peace negotiations in the Russian invasion of Ukraine">Peace negotiations in the Russian invasion of Ukraine</a>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/President_of_the_United_States" title="President of the United States">U.S. president</a> <a href="/wiki/Donald_Trump" title="Donald Trump">Donald Trump</a> announces that he will be meeting <a href="/wiki/President_of_Russia" title="President of Russia">Russian president</a> <a href="/wiki/Vladimir_Putin" title="Vladimir Putin">Vladimir Putin</a> in <a href="/wiki/Alaska" title="Alaska">Alaska</a>, <a href="/wiki/United_States" title="United States">United States</a>, for talks on August 15 to discuss ending the <a href="/wiki/Russian_invasion_of_Ukraine" title="Russian invasion of Ukraine">war in Ukraine</a>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.theatlantic.com/politics/archive/2025/08/trump-putin-zelensky-alaska/683815/">(<i>The Atlantic</i>)</a> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/articles/crev9ep2vdgo">(BBC News)</a></li></ul></li></ul>
<p><b>Law and crime</b>
</p>
<ul><li>Eight people are killed and three others are injured in a <a href="/wiki/Mass_shooting" title="Mass shooting">mass shooting</a> at a <a href="/wiki/Nightclub" title="Nightclub">nightclub</a> in <a href="/wiki/Santa_Luc%C3%ADa_Canton" title="Santa Luca Canton">Santa Luca Canton</a>, <a href="/wiki/Guayas_Province" title="Guayas Province">Guayas Province</a>, <a href="/wiki/Ecuador" title="Ecuador">Ecuador</a>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://apnews.com/article/ecuador-nightclub-shooting-killed-injured-6f2f233ff010f95e96f765c7cbf23e56">(AP)</a></li></ul></div></div></div>
<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1248507241"><div class="current-events"><div id="2025_August_09"></div>
<div role="region" aria-label="August 9" id="2025_August_9" class="current-events-main vevent">
    <div class="current-events-heading plainlinks">
        <div class="current-events-title" role="heading"><span class="summary">August 9, 2025<span style="display: none;"> (<span class="bday dtstart published updated itvstart">2025-08-09</span>)</span> (Saturday)</span>
        </div>
        <ul class="current-events-navbar editlink noprint"><li><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Portal:Current_events/2025_August_9&action=edit&editintro=Portal:Current_events/Edit_instructions">edit</a></li><li><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Portal:Current_events/2025_August_9&action=history">history</a></li><li><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Portal:Current_events/2025_August_9&action=watch">watch</a></li>
        </ul>
    </div>
    <div class="current-events-content description">
<p><b>Disasters and accidents</b>
</p>
<ul><li>At least six <a href="/wiki/Lebanon" title="Lebanon">Lebanese</a> soldiers are killed in an explosion as troops were removing munitions from a <a href="/wiki/Hezbollah" title="Hezbollah">Hezbollah</a> facility near the <a href="/wiki/Israel%E2%80%93Lebanon_border" class="mw-redirect" title="IsraelLebanon border">Israeli</a> border. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://english.alarabiya.net/News/middle-east/2025/08/09/munitions-blast-in-hezbollah-site-kills-5-lebanese-troops-military-source-">(Al Arabiya)</a></li></ul>
<p><b>International relations</b>
</p>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Atomic_bombings_of_Hiroshima_and_Nagasaki" title="Atomic bombings of Hiroshima and Nagasaki">Atomic bombings of Hiroshima and Nagasaki</a>
<ul><li>In commemoration of the 80th anniversary of the atomic bombings of <a href="/wiki/Hiroshima" title="Hiroshima">Hiroshima</a> and <a href="/wiki/Nagasaki" title="Nagasaki">Nagasaki</a>, the twin bells of <a href="/wiki/Urakami_Cathedral" class="mw-redirect" title="Urakami Cathedral">Urakami Cathedral</a>, that were destroyed, are restored in Nagasaki. The anniversary is attended by about 2,600 people, including foreign dignitaries and survivors of the bombings. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://apnews.com/article/japan-nagasaki-atomic-bombing-anniversary-wwii-ceremony-409af035fc6ca4834f5102592e8d464b">(AP)</a> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.cbc.ca/news/world/japan-hiroshima-80th-anniversary-august-9-1.7605183">(CBC)</a> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://news.sky.com/story/survivors-relatives-pledge-to-make-nagasaki-the-last-ever-atomic-bomb-site-on-80th-anniversary-13408947">(Sky News)</a></li></ul></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Foreign_relations_of_Singapore" title="Foreign relations of Singapore">Foreign relations of Singapore</a>
<ul><li>Multiple national leaders attend celebrations of the 60th anniversary of <a href="/wiki/Singapore" title="Singapore">Singaporean</a> <a href="/wiki/Independence_of_Singapore_Agreement_1965" title="Independence of Singapore Agreement 1965">independence</a>, including <a href="/wiki/President_of_Indonesia" title="President of Indonesia">President of Indonesia</a> <a href="/wiki/Prabowo_Subianto" title="Prabowo Subianto">Prabowo Subianto</a> and <a href="/wiki/Sultan_of_Brunei" class="mw-redirect" title="Sultan of Brunei">Sultan of Brunei</a> <a href="/wiki/Hassanal_Bolkiah" title="Hassanal Bolkiah">Hassanal Bolkiah</a>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2025/8/9/singapore-celebrates-success-on-60th-anniversary-but-challenges-loom-ahead">(Al Jazeera)</a> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.thejakartapost.com/world/2025/08/10/prabowo-joins-singapores-national-day-parade.html">(<i>The Jakarta Post</i>)</a> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2025/08/09/zahid-arrives-in-singapore-for-the-2025-singapore-national-day-parade">(<i>The Star</i>)</a></li></ul></li></ul>
<p><b>Law and crime</b>
</p>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Haitian_crisis" class="mw-redirect" title="Haitian crisis">Haitian crisis</a>
<ul><li>The <a href="/wiki/Haitian_Government" class="mw-redirect" title="Haitian Government">Haitian Government</a> announces a three-month <a href="/wiki/State_of_emergency" title="State of emergency">state of emergency</a> in the central and western regions of <a href="/wiki/Haiti" title="Haiti">Haiti</a> aiming to curb hunger and <a href="/wiki/Haitian_conflict_(2020-Present)" class="mw-redirect" title="Haitian conflict (2020-Present)">gang violence in the regions</a>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2025/8/9/haiti-declares-three-month-state-of-emergency-as-gang-violence-spikes">(Al Jazeera)</a> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://apnews.com/article/haiti-state-of-emergency-gangs-west-artibonite-5afeb9b859928436eaf4c362fbb91489">(AP)</a></li></ul></li>
<li>Two people are killed and five others are injured in a <a href="/wiki/Drive-by_shooting" title="Drive-by shooting">drive-by</a> <a href="/wiki/Mass_shooting" title="Mass shooting">mass shooting</a> in a busy area in <a href="/wiki/Nassau,_The_Bahamas" title="Nassau, The Bahamas">Nassau</a>, <a href="/wiki/The_Bahamas" title="The Bahamas">The Bahamas</a>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.thenassauguardian.com/news/two-dead-five-others-injured-in-shooting/article_7f07d912-d6d4-4fbf-9434-dc0ebb85b88c.html">(<i>The Nassau Guardian</i>)</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Metropolitan_Police" title="Metropolitan Police">Metropolitan Police</a> carry out the largest mass detainments in <a href="/wiki/London" title="London">London</a>'s history, detaining at least 466 people for peacefully protesting the UKs ban on the pro-Palestine activist network <a href="/wiki/Palestine_Action" title="Palestine Action">Palestine Action</a>. Protesters gathered in <a href="/wiki/Parliament_Square" title="Parliament Square">Parliament Square</a> to denounce the <a href="/wiki/Israeli_invasion_of_Gaza" class="mw-redirect" title="Israeli invasion of Gaza">Israeli invasion of Gaza</a> and the criminalisation of support for Palestine Action, with many holding signs reading I oppose <a href="/wiki/Gaza_genocide" title="Gaza genocide">genocide</a>, I support Palestine Action before being forcibly removed by police. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2025/8/9/uk-police-arrest-at-least-200-in-palestine-action-protest-in-london">(Al Jazeera)</a></li>
<li>Former <a href="/wiki/Chad" title="Chad">Chadian</a> <a href="/wiki/Prime_minister_of_Chad" class="mw-redirect" title="Prime minister of Chad">prime minister</a> and leader of the <a href="/wiki/Les_Transformateurs" title="Les Transformateurs">Les Transformateurs</a> party <a href="/wiki/Succ%C3%A8s_Masra" title="Succs Masra">Succs Masra</a> is sentenced to 20 years in prison and fined <a href="/wiki/Central_African_CFA_franc" title="Central African CFA franc">F.CFA</a> 1 billion (US$1,775,200) after being convicted of disseminating racist and xenophobic messages that incited violence, a verdict his legal team plans to appeal. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/chads-former-pm-opposition-leader-sentenced-20-years-2025-08-09/">(Reuters)</a></li></ul></div></div></div>
<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1248507241"><div class="current-events"><div id="2025_August_08"></div>
<div role="region" aria-label="August 8" id="2025_August_8" class="current-events-main vevent">
    <div class="current-events-heading plainlinks">
        <div class="current-events-title" role="heading"><span class="summary">August 8, 2025<span style="display: none;"> (<span class="bday dtstart published updated itvstart">2025-08-08</span>)</span> (Friday)</span>
        </div>
        <ul class="current-events-navbar editlink noprint"><li><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Portal:Current_events/2025_August_8&action=edit&editintro=Portal:Current_events/Edit_instructions">edit</a></li><li><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Portal:Current_events/2025_August_8&action=history">history</a></li><li><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Portal:Current_events/2025_August_8&action=watch">watch</a></li>
        </ul>
    </div>
    <div class="current-events-content description">
<p><b>Armed conflicts and attacks</b>
</p>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Gaza_war" title="Gaza war">Gaza war</a>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Israeli_invasion_of_the_Gaza_Strip" title="Israeli invasion of the Gaza Strip">Israeli invasion of the Gaza Strip</a>, <a href="/wiki/Israeli_reoccupation_of_the_Gaza_Strip" title="Israeli reoccupation of the Gaza Strip">Israeli reoccupation of the Gaza Strip</a>
<ul><li>The <a href="/wiki/Israel" title="Israel">Israeli</a> <a href="/wiki/Security_Cabinet_of_Israel" title="Security Cabinet of Israel">Security Cabinet</a> approves <a href="/wiki/Prime_Minister_of_Israel" title="Prime Minister of Israel">Prime Minister</a> <a href="/wiki/Benjamin_Netanyahu" title="Benjamin Netanyahu">Benjamin Netanyahu</a>'s plan to capture <a href="/wiki/Gaza_City" title="Gaza City">Gaza City</a> with the stated objective of defeating <a href="/wiki/Hamas" title="Hamas">Hamas</a>, while supposedly ensuring the provision of <a href="/wiki/Humanitarian_aid" title="Humanitarian aid">humanitarian aid</a> to civilians outside the areas of combat. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2025-08-08/israel-security-cabinet-approves-pm-s-plan-to-seize-gaza-city-me26un7f">(Bloomberg)</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Germany" title="Germany">Germany</a> announces it will halt weapon shipments to Israel that could be used in Gaza "until further notice" in light of Israel's plan to fully <a href="/wiki/Military_occupation" title="Military occupation">militarily occupy</a> <a href="/wiki/Gaza_Strip" title="Gaza Strip">Gaza</a>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://apnews.com/article/germany-mideast-weapons-b957e28b73ee94ed33fbd2d4e4d36246">(AP)</a></li>
<li>The <a href="/wiki/Israel_Defense_Forces" title="Israel Defense Forces">Israel Defense Forces</a> begins massing <a href="/wiki/Israeli_Ground_Forces" title="Israeli Ground Forces">troops</a> and <a href="/wiki/Armored_Corps_(Israel)" title="Armored Corps (Israel)">tanks</a> on the <a href="/wiki/Gaza%E2%80%93Israel_barrier" title="GazaIsrael barrier">border with Gaza</a> ahead of an expected major ground offensive. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/middle-east/ground-invasion-in-gaza-israel-military-building-up-troops-equipment-near-border-report/articleshow/123183462.cms">(<i>The Times of India</i>)</a></li></ul></li></ul></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Kivu_conflict" title="Kivu conflict">Kivu conflict</a>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/M23_campaign_(2022%E2%80%93present)" title="M23 campaign (2022present)">M23 campaign</a>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Volker_T%C3%BCrk" title="Volker Trk">Volker Trk</a>, the <a href="/wiki/Office_of_the_United_Nations_High_Commissioner_for_Human_Rights" title="Office of the United Nations High Commissioner for Human Rights">UN high commissioner for human rights</a>, reports that <a href="/wiki/M23_rebels" class="mw-redirect" title="M23 rebels">M23 rebels</a> have killed over 319 civilians in July. M23 president <a href="/wiki/Bertrand_Bisimwa" title="Bertrand Bisimwa">Bertrand Bisimwa</a> said the group would investigate the claim. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2025/8/6/m23-rebels-killed-319-civilians-in-east-dr-congo-in-july-un-says">(Al Jazeera)</a> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/m23-rebels-killed-319-civilians-east-congo-july-un-rights-chief-says-2025-08-06/">(Reuters)</a></li></ul></li></ul></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Insurgency_in_Balochistan" title="Insurgency in Balochistan">Insurgency in Balochistan</a>
<ul><li>At least 33 <a href="/wiki/Pakistani_Taliban" title="Pakistani Taliban">Pakistani Taliban</a> <a href="/wiki/Militant" title="Militant">militants</a> are killed in an overnight operation near the <a href="/wiki/Afghanistan" title="Afghanistan">Afghanistan</a> border in <a href="/wiki/Zhob" title="Zhob">Zhob</a>, <a href="/wiki/Balochistan,_Pakistan" title="Balochistan, Pakistan">Balochistan</a>, <a href="/wiki/Pakistan" title="Pakistan">Pakistan</a>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.ctvnews.ca/world/article/pakistani-forces-kill-33-militants-in-overnight-operation-near-afghan-border/">(CTV News)</a></li></ul></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/War_on_drugs" title="War on drugs">War on drugs</a>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/U.S._president" class="mw-redirect" title="U.S. president">U.S. president</a> <a href="/wiki/Donald_Trump" title="Donald Trump">Donald Trump</a> signs an <a href="/wiki/Executive_order" title="Executive order">executive order</a> commanding the <a href="/wiki/United_States_Armed_Forces" title="United States Armed Forces">U.S. military</a> and other sectors of the <a href="/wiki/Federal_government_of_the_United_States" title="Federal government of the United States">federal government</a> to take action against <a href="/wiki/Latin_America" title="Latin America">Latin American</a> <a href="/wiki/Drug_cartels" class="mw-redirect" title="Drug cartels">drug cartels</a> <a href="/wiki/United_States_Department_of_State_list_of_Foreign_Terrorist_Organizations" title="United States Department of State list of Foreign Terrorist Organizations">designated as terrorist organisations</a>, such as <a href="/wiki/Tren_de_Aragua" title="Tren de Aragua">Tren de Aragua</a> and <a href="/wiki/MS-13" title="MS-13">MS-13</a>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2025/8/8/trump-signs-order-authorising-military-action-against-cartels-reports">(Al Jazeera)</a> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.nytimes.com/2025/08/08/us/trump-military-drug-cartels.html">(<i>The New York Times</i>)</a></li></ul></li></ul>
<p><b>Disasters and accidents</b>
</p>
<ul><li>A bus carrying mourners back home from a funeral in <a href="/wiki/Kisumu" title="Kisumu">Kisumu</a>, <a href="/wiki/Kenya" title="Kenya">Kenya</a>, overturns and plunges into a ditch, killing at least 21 people. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.msn.com/en-gb/news/world/a-bus-carrying-mourners-from-a-funeral-overturns-in-kenya-killing-21-people/ar-AA1KaN3Y?ocid=msedgdhp&pc=U531&cvid=46626e408c0048a591c5168ba0abbf06&ei=24">(MSN)</a></li>
<li>A bus and a truck collide head-on in <a href="/wiki/Mato_Grosso" title="Mato Grosso">Mato Grosso</a>, <a href="/wiki/Brazil" title="Brazil">Brazil</a>, killing 11 people and injuring 45 others. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/bus-collision-with-truck-kills-11-injures-45-brazil-2025-08-09/">(Reuters)</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Flash_flood" title="Flash flood">Flash floods</a> kill at least 22 people and leave two dozen others missing in <a href="/wiki/Gansu_province" class="mw-redirect" title="Gansu province">Gansu province</a>, <a href="/wiki/China" title="China">China</a>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.msn.com/en-gb/news/world/flash-floods-kill-at-least-10-people-and-leave-33-missing-in-northwestern-china/ar-AA1K9Iwp?ocid=msedgntp&pc=U531&cvid=6895e4ba8d2945f3aa25215a456a47dd&ei=29">(MSN)</a></li>
<li>At least 30 people are injured when a passenger train derails on the KermanZarand railway path in <a href="/wiki/Kerman_province" title="Kerman province">Kerman province</a>, <a href="/wiki/Iran" title="Iran">Iran</a>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://tribune.com.pk/story/2560356/at-least-30-injured-after-train-derails-in-southern-iran">(<i>The Express Tribune</i>)</a></li>
<li>A fire breaks out at the <a href="/wiki/Mosque%E2%80%93Cathedral_of_C%C3%B3rdoba" title="MosqueCathedral of Crdoba">MosqueCathedral of Crdoba</a>, a <a href="/wiki/UNESCO_World_Heritage_Site" class="mw-redirect" title="UNESCO World Heritage Site">UNESCO World Heritage Site</a> in <a href="/wiki/Andalusia" title="Andalusia">Andalusia</a>, <a href="/wiki/Spain" title="Spain">Spain</a>, due to a short circuit. The roof of a chapel collapses, but the fire is extinguished with no further damage. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.theguardian.com/world/2025/aug/08/fire-breaks-out-at-cordobas-ancient-mosque-turned-cathedral-la-mezquita">(<i>The Guardian</i>)</a> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://elpais.com/cultura/2025-08-09/colapsa-el-techo-de-la-capilla-donde-se-origino-el-incendio-de-la-mezquita.html">(<i>El Pas</i>)</a></li></ul>
<p><b>International relations</b>
</p>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Armenia%E2%80%93Azerbaijan_relations" title="ArmeniaAzerbaijan relations">ArmeniaAzerbaijan relations</a>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Armenia%E2%80%93Azerbaijan_peace_agreement" title="ArmeniaAzerbaijan peace agreement">ArmeniaAzerbaijan peace agreement</a>
<ul><li>The leaders of <a href="/wiki/Armenia" title="Armenia">Armenia</a> and <a href="/wiki/Azerbaijan" title="Azerbaijan">Azerbaijan</a> plan to sign a joint declaration at the <a href="/wiki/White_House" title="White House">White House</a> in <a href="/wiki/Washington,_D.C." title="Washington, D.C.">Washington, D.C.</a>, <a href="/wiki/United_States" title="United States">United States</a>, committing to a peace deal facilitated by the <a href="/wiki/Second_presidency_of_Donald_Trump" title="Second presidency of Donald Trump">Trump administration</a> that would end nearly four decades of conflict between the two countries. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.cnn.com/2025/08/08/politics/strategic-armenia-azerbaijan-corridor-named-after-trump">(CNN)</a></li>
<li>Armenia agrees to grant the U.S. exclusive development rights in the <a href="/wiki/Zangezur_corridor" title="Zangezur corridor">Zangezur corridor</a> for 99 years. The U.S. would sublease to a consortium to develop rail, oil, gas, and fiber optic lines along the 27-mile (43km) corridor. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.politico.com/news/2025/08/07/us-deal-armenia-azerbaijan-00499285">(Politico)</a></li></ul></li></ul></li></ul>
<p><b>Law and crime</b>
</p>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/2025_Anaconda_shooting" title="2025 Anaconda shooting">2025 Anaconda shooting</a>
<ul><li>The suspected perpetrator of the bar shooting that killed four people last week in <a href="/wiki/Anaconda,_Montana" title="Anaconda, Montana">Anaconda</a>, <a href="/wiki/Montana" title="Montana">Montana</a>, United States, is arrested. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.krtv.com/news/crime-and-courts/anaconda-shootings-suspect-arrested">(KRTV-TV)</a></li></ul></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/2024_South_Korean_martial_law_crisis" title="2024 South Korean martial law crisis">2024 South Korean martial law crisis</a>
<ul><li>The <a href="/wiki/Judiciary_of_South_Korea" title="Judiciary of South Korea">Seoul Central District Court</a> rejects a petition brought by former <a href="/wiki/Ministry_of_the_Interior_and_Safety" title="Ministry of the Interior and Safety">interior minister</a> <a href="/wiki/Lee_Sang-min_(lawyer)" title="Lee Sang-min (lawyer)">Lee Sang-min</a> regarding the arrest warrant against him over his alleged involvement in former <a href="/wiki/President_of_South_Korea" title="President of South Korea">president</a> <a href="/wiki/Yoon_Suk_Yeol" title="Yoon Suk Yeol">Yoon Suk Yeol</a>'s martial law attempt on December 3, 2024. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.koreatimes.co.kr/southkorea/law-crime/20250808/court-dismisses-ex-interior-ministers-petition-against-arrest">(<i>The Korea Times</i>)</a></li></ul></li>
<li>A police officer and the perpetrator are killed, and another officer suffers non-life-threatening injuries, in a shooting at the <a href="/wiki/Centers_for_Disease_Control_and_Prevention" title="Centers for Disease Control and Prevention">CDC</a> building near <a href="/wiki/Emory_University" title="Emory University">Emory University</a> in <a href="/wiki/Atlanta" title="Atlanta">Atlanta</a>, <a href="/wiki/Georgia_(U.S._state)" title="Georgia (U.S. state)">Georgia</a>, United States. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.cnn.com/us/live-news/active-shooter-emory-university?t=1754695635612">(CNN)</a> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.fox5atlanta.com/news/centers-disease-control-active-shooter-emory-university">(WAGA-TV)</a></li>
<li>The <a href="/wiki/Uganda_High_Court" class="mw-redirect" title="Uganda High Court">Uganda High Court</a> denies bail to opposition figure <a href="/wiki/Kizza_Besigye" title="Kizza Besigye">Kizza Besigye</a>, who faces treason charges, ruling that the 180-day period for mandatory release began when his case was transferred to a civilian court in February, leaving him 12 days short of eligibility. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/ugandan-court-denies-bail-veteran-opposition-leader-treason-case-2025-08-08/">(Reuters)</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Portugal" title="Portugal">Portugal</a>'s <a href="/wiki/Constitutional_Court_(Portugal)" title="Constitutional Court (Portugal)">Constitutional Court</a> blocks a <a href="/wiki/Assembly_of_the_Republic_(Portugal)" title="Assembly of the Republic (Portugal)">parliamentary</a> bill that would require most legally resident <a href="/wiki/Immigration_to_Portugal" title="Immigration to Portugal">immigrants</a> to wait two years before applying for <a href="/wiki/Family_reunification" title="Family reunification">family reunification</a>, ruling that it violates <a href="/wiki/Constitution_of_Portugal" title="Constitution of Portugal">constitutional</a> protections for family unity. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.reuters.com/world/portugals-top-court-blocks-bill-restricting-immigration-2025-08-09/">(Reuters)</a></li></ul></div></div></div>
<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1248507241"><div class="current-events"><div id="2025_August_07"></div>
<div role="region" aria-label="August 7" id="2025_August_7" class="current-events-main vevent">
    <div class="current-events-heading plainlinks">
        <div class="current-events-title" role="heading"><span class="summary">August 7, 2025<span style="display: none;"> (<span class="bday dtstart published updated itvstart">2025-08-07</span>)</span> (Thursday)</span>
        </div>
        <ul class="current-events-navbar editlink noprint"><li><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Portal:Current_events/2025_August_7&action=edit&editintro=Portal:Current_events/Edit_instructions">edit</a></li><li><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Portal:Current_events/2025_August_7&action=history">history</a></li><li><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Portal:Current_events/2025_August_7&action=watch">watch</a></li>
        </ul>
    </div>
    <div class="current-events-content description">
<p><b>Armed conflicts and attacks</b>
</p>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Kivu_conflict" title="Kivu conflict">Kivu conflict</a>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/M23_campaign_(2022%E2%80%93present)" title="M23 campaign (2022present)">M23 campaign</a>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/March_23_Movement" title="March 23 Movement">M23 rebels</a> attack <a href="/wiki/Wazalendo" title="Wazalendo">Wazalendo</a> militia Decisive Movement for the Liberation of Congo positions in Kamakombe and <a href="/wiki/Kasheke" title="Kasheke">Kasheke</a>, <a href="/wiki/Democratic_Republic_of_the_Congo" title="Democratic Republic of the Congo">Democratic Republic of the Congo</a>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.radiookapi.net/2025/08/08/actualite/securite/sud-kivu-4-civils-tues-dans-des-affrontements-entre-le-m23-et-les">(Radio Okapi)</a></li></ul></li></ul></li></ul>
<p><b>Business and economy</b>
</p>
<ul><li>The <a href="/wiki/Egyptian_government" class="mw-redirect" title="Egyptian government">Egyptian government</a> signs a $35bn deal to import 130 billion cubic metres of gas from <a href="/wiki/Israel" title="Israel">Israel</a>'s <a href="/wiki/Leviathan_gas_field" title="Leviathan gas field">Leviathan gas field</a> which will remain in effect until 2040, despite the <a href="/wiki/Israeli_invasion_of_Gaza" class="mw-redirect" title="Israeli invasion of Gaza">Israeli invasion of Gaza</a>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.middleeasteye.net/news/egypt-signs-record-35-bn-gas-deal-israel-paying-14-percent-more-imports">(Middle East Eye)</a></li></ul>
<p><b>Disasters and accidents</b>
</p>
<ul><li>At least eight people are killed and several others are injured when a train and a <a href="/wiki/Kenya_Pipeline_Company" title="Kenya Pipeline Company">Kenya Pipeline</a>-owned bus collide on a <a href="/wiki/Level_crossing" title="Level crossing">level crossing</a> in <a href="/wiki/Naivasha" title="Naivasha">Naivasha</a>, <a href="/wiki/Nakuru_County" title="Nakuru County">Nakuru County</a>, <a href="/wiki/Kenya" title="Kenya">Kenya</a>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://nation.africa/kenya/counties/nakuru/tragedy-as-8-killed-in-naivasha-crash-involving-a-train-and-kpc-bus-5147226">(<i>Daily Nation</i>)</a></li>
<li>At least six people are killed and two others are injured when an <a href="/wiki/Air_medical_services" title="Air medical services">air ambulance</a> crashes into a residential area in Mwihoko, <a href="/wiki/Kiambu_County" title="Kiambu County">Kiambu County</a>, Kenya. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://apnews.com/article/kenya-helicopter-crash-2fe1954ac9013b1f68ac89798c733c4c">(AP)</a> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2025/8/7/at-least-six-killed-two-injured-in-medical-plane-crash-in-kenya">(Al Jazeera)</a></li>
<li>Five people are killed and several are injured when a malfunctioning gas cylinder explodes in <a href="/wiki/Visakhapatnam" title="Visakhapatnam">Visakhapatnam</a>, <a href="/wiki/Andhra_Pradesh" title="Andhra Pradesh">Andhra Pradesh</a>, <a href="/wiki/India" title="India">India</a>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.msn.com/en-in/news/India/visakhapatnam-blast-5-killed-several-injured-in-gas-cylinder-explosion-in-andhra-pradesh-video/ar-AA1K60TF?ocid=BingNewsSerp">(MSN)</a></li>
<li>Two people are killed when a helicopter crashes into an unmanned <a href="/wiki/Barge" title="Barge">barge</a> on the <a href="/wiki/Mississippi_River" title="Mississippi River">Mississippi River</a> near <a href="/wiki/East_Alton,_Illinois" title="East Alton, Illinois">East Alton</a>, <a href="/wiki/Illinois" title="Illinois">Illinois</a>, <a href="/wiki/United_States" title="United States">United States</a>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://apnews.com/article/helicopter-crash-barge-illinois-missouri-b7c2cb9bc6b57f93e3be985fe0878df2">(AP)</a></li></ul>
<p><b>International relations</b>
</p>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/United_States%E2%80%93Venezuela_relations" title="United StatesVenezuela relations">United StatesVenezuela relations</a>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/United_States_Attorney_General" title="United States Attorney General">U.S. attorney general</a> <a href="/wiki/Pam_Bondi" title="Pam Bondi">Pam Bondi</a> announces a $50 million reward for information leading to the arrest of <a href="/wiki/President_of_Venezuela" title="President of Venezuela">Venezuelan president</a> <a href="/wiki/Nicol%C3%A1s_Maduro" title="Nicols Maduro">Nicols Maduro</a>, saying his capture and <a href="/wiki/Extradition" title="Extradition">extradition</a> to the <a href="/wiki/United_States" title="United States">United States</a> is vital for <a href="/wiki/National_security" title="National security">national security</a>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.bbc.com/news/articles/cwy1wn1x521o">(BBC News)</a></li></ul></li></ul>
<p><b>Law and crime</b>
</p>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Mass_shootings_in_the_United_States" title="Mass shootings in the United States">Mass shootings in the United States</a>
<ul><li>Two people are killed and three others are injured, including two <a href="/wiki/Pennsylvania_State_Police" title="Pennsylvania State Police">state troopers</a>, in a <a href="/wiki/Mass_shooting" title="Mass shooting">mass shooting</a> when a man kills his neighbor and opens fire on law enforcement before being killed in <a href="/wiki/Thompson_Township,_Susquehanna_County,_Pennsylvania" title="Thompson Township, Susquehanna County, Pennsylvania">Thompson Township</a>, <a href="/wiki/Susquehanna_County,_Pennsylvania" title="Susquehanna County, Pennsylvania">Susquehanna County</a>, <a href="/wiki/Pennsylvania" title="Pennsylvania">Pennsylvania</a>, United States. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.bbc.com/news/articles/crm4keey0vro">(BBC News)</a> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://local21news.com/news/local/gunman-dead-after-allegedly-killing-neighbor-before-shooting-2-pa-state-troopers">(WHP-TV)</a></li></ul></li></ul>
<p><b>Politics and elections</b>
</p>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/United_Kingdom" title="United Kingdom">British</a> <a href="/wiki/Parliamentary_Under-Secretary_of_State_for_Housing_and_Homelessness" title="Parliamentary Under-Secretary of State for Housing and Homelessness">Parliamentary Under-Secretary of State for Housing and Homelessness</a> <a href="/wiki/Rushanara_Ali" title="Rushanara Ali">Rushanara Ali</a> resigns amid controversy over increasing the rent at a property she owns in <a href="/wiki/East_London" title="East London">east London</a> by <a href="/wiki/%C2%A3" class="mw-redirect" title=""></a>700 in order to force the <a href="/wiki/Lease" title="Lease">tenants</a> to move. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/articles/clyd3l2x2n8o">(BBC News)</a></li>
<li>The <a href="/wiki/Council_of_Ministers_of_Lebanon" title="Council of Ministers of Lebanon">cabinet</a> of <a href="/wiki/Lebanon" title="Lebanon">Lebanon</a> approves a U.S. proposal for disarming <a href="/wiki/Hezbollah" title="Hezbollah">Hezbollah</a> by the end of the year, along with ending <a href="/wiki/2024_Israeli_invasion_of_Lebanon" title="2024 Israeli invasion of Lebanon">Israel's occupation in the country</a>, despite Hezbollah's rejection of this demand. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2025/8/7/lebanese-cabinet-holds-more-talks-on-disarming-hezbollah-under-us-pressure">(Al Jazeera)</a></li></ul>
<p><b>Science and technology</b>
</p>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/OpenAI" title="OpenAI">OpenAI</a> releases <a href="/wiki/GPT-5" title="GPT-5">ChatGPT-5</a> with "<a href="/wiki/PhD" class="mw-redirect" title="PhD">PhD</a>-level intelligence" to the general public. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.theguardian.com/technology/2025/aug/07/openai-chatgpt-upgrade-big-step-forward-human-jobs-gpt-5/">(<i>The Guardian</i>)</a></li></ul></div></div></div>
<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1248507241"><div class="current-events"><div id="2025_August_06"></div>
<div role="region" aria-label="August 6" id="2025_August_6" class="current-events-main vevent">
    <div class="current-events-heading plainlinks">
        <div class="current-events-title" role="heading"><span class="summary">August 6, 2025<span style="display: none;"> (<span class="bday dtstart published updated itvstart">2025-08-06</span>)</span> (Wednesday)</span>
        </div>
        <ul class="current-events-navbar editlink noprint"><li><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Portal:Current_events/2025_August_6&action=edit&editintro=Portal:Current_events/Edit_instructions">edit</a></li><li><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Portal:Current_events/2025_August_6&action=history">history</a></li><li><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Portal:Current_events/2025_August_6&action=watch">watch</a></li>
        </ul>
    </div>
    <div class="current-events-content description">
<p><b>Armed conflicts and attacks</b>
</p>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Sudanese_civil_war_(2023%E2%80%93present)" title="Sudanese civil war (2023present)">Sudanese civil war</a>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/2025_alleged_shootdown_of_UAE_mercenary_plane" title="2025 alleged shootdown of UAE mercenary plane">2025 alleged shootdown of UAE mercenary plane</a>
<ul><li>The <a href="/wiki/Sudanese_Armed_Forces" title="Sudanese Armed Forces">Sudanese Armed Forces</a> claims that it shot down an <a href="/wiki/UAE" class="mw-redirect" title="UAE">Emirati</a> plane carrying mercenaries near <a href="/wiki/Nyala,_South_Darfur" title="Nyala, South Darfur">Nyala</a>, <a href="/wiki/South_Darfur" title="South Darfur">South Darfur</a>, Sudan, allegedly killing at least 40 people. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.france24.com/es/%C3%A1frica/20250806-mercenarios-colombianos-mueren-en-el-derribo-de-avi%C3%B3n-en-sud%C3%A1n">(France 24)</a></li></ul></li></ul></li></ul>
<p><b>Disasters and accidents</b>
</p>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/2025_European_and_Mediterranean_wildfires" title="2025 European and Mediterranean wildfires">2025 European and Mediterranean wildfires</a>
<ul><li>One person is killed, thirteen people are injured and one person is missing after a <a href="/wiki/Wildfire" title="Wildfire">wildfire</a> breaks out in <a href="/wiki/Aude" title="Aude">Aude department</a>, <a href="/wiki/France" title="France">France</a>, also burning at least 16,000 hectares of land. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.bbc.com/news/articles/cj6y803pjkwo">(BBC News)</a> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.dw.com/en/deadly-unprecedented-wildfire-rages-in-southwestern-france/a-73542333">(DW)</a></li>
<li>Over 1,500 people are evacuated from a resort in <a href="/wiki/Tarifa" title="Tarifa">Tarifa</a>, <a href="/wiki/Andalusia" title="Andalusia">Andalusia</a>, <a href="/wiki/Spain" title="Spain">Spain</a>, after a wildfire breaks out in <a href="/wiki/Campo_de_Gibraltar" title="Campo de Gibraltar">Campo de Gibraltar</a>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.lemonde.fr/en/europe/article/2025/08/06/wildfire-in-southern-france-kills-one-resort-in-spain-evacuated_6744128_143.html">(<i>Le Monde</i>)</a>  <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.europasur.es/tarifa/video-incendio-forestal-caravana-llamas-viento-levante-fuego_8_2004530680.html">(<i>Europa Sur</i>)</a></li></ul></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/2025_Ghanaian_Air_Force_Z-9_helicopter_crash" title="2025 Ghanaian Air Force Z-9 helicopter crash">2025 Ghanaian Air Force Z-9 helicopter crash</a>
<ul><li>A <a href="/wiki/Ghana_Air_Force" title="Ghana Air Force">Ghana Air Force</a> <a href="/wiki/Harbin_Z-9" title="Harbin Z-9">Z-9</a> helicopter crashes near <a href="/wiki/Obuasi" title="Obuasi">Obuasi</a>, <a href="/wiki/Ashanti_Region" title="Ashanti Region">Ashanti Region</a>, <a href="/wiki/Ghana" title="Ghana">Ghana</a>, killing eight people, including <a href="/wiki/Minister_for_Defence_(Ghana)" title="Minister for Defence (Ghana)">defence minister</a> <a href="/wiki/Edward_Omane_Boamah" title="Edward Omane Boamah">Edward Omane Boamah</a>, <a href="/wiki/Ministry_of_Environment,_Science,_Technology_and_Innovation" title="Ministry of Environment, Science, Technology and Innovation">environment and science minister</a> <a href="/wiki/Ibrahim_Murtala_Muhammed" title="Ibrahim Murtala Muhammed">Ibrahim Murtala Muhammed</a>, and regional minister <a href="/wiki/Samuel_Sarpong" title="Samuel Sarpong">Samuel Sarpong</a>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.bbc.com/pidgin/articles/cqle6xr4qzzo.amp">(BBC News)</a></li></ul></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Gaza_Strip_famine" title="Gaza Strip famine">Gaza Strip famine</a>
<ul><li>A truck carrying <a href="/wiki/Humanitarian_aid" title="Humanitarian aid">humanitarian aid</a> overturns on civilians near the <a href="/wiki/Nuseirat_refugee_camp" title="Nuseirat refugee camp">Nuseirat refugee camp</a> in the <a href="/wiki/Gaza_Strip" title="Gaza Strip">Gaza Strip</a>, killing at least 25 people and injuring dozens of others. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.aa.com.tr/en/middle-east/at-least-25-dead-after-aid-truck-overturns-on-crowd-in-gaza/3651635">(Anadolu Agency)</a> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.theguardian.com/world/live/2025/aug/06/middle-east-crisis-live-aid-truck-gaza-israel-netanyahu-latest-news-updates">(<i>The Guardian</i>)</a></li></ul></li>
<li>Twelve people are killed and 13 others are injured after a <a href="/wiki/Dump_truck" title="Dump truck">dump truck</a> plunges into a ravine in <a href="/wiki/Lebak,_Sultan_Kudarat" title="Lebak, Sultan Kudarat">Lebak, Sultan Kudarat</a>, near the provincial boundary with <a href="/wiki/Maguindanao_del_Sur" title="Maguindanao del Sur">Maguindanao del Sur</a> in the <a href="/wiki/Philippines" title="Philippines">Philippines</a>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.abs-cbn.com/news/regions/2025/8/7/8-dead-15-hurt-as-truck-falls-down-ravine-in-sultan-kudarat-1315">(ABS-CBN News)</a> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://mb.com.ph/2025/08/06/sultan-ku10-dead-as-truck-plunges-into-ravine">(<i>Manila Bulletin</i>)</a></li>
<li>Five people are killed and 24 others are injured when a suspension bridge deck tilts at a scenic spot in <a href="/wiki/Zhaosu_County" title="Zhaosu County">Zhaosu County</a>, <a href="/wiki/Ili_Kazakh_Autonomous_Prefecture" title="Ili Kazakh Autonomous Prefecture">Ili Kazakh Autonomous Prefecture</a>, <a href="/wiki/Xinjiang" title="Xinjiang">Xinjiang</a>, <a href="/wiki/China" title="China">China</a>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://global.chinadaily.com.cn/a/202508/07/WS68939a07a3108a99c1905842.html">(<i>China Daily</i>)</a></li></ul>
<p><b>Health and environment</b>
</p>
<ul><li>A month-long <a href="/wiki/Legionnaires%27_disease" title="Legionnaires' disease">legionnaires' disease</a> outbreak that started on July 8 in <a href="/wiki/London,_Ontario" title="London, Ontario">London</a>, <a href="/wiki/Ontario" title="Ontario">Ontario</a>, Canada, ends after 70 cases and three deaths. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.ctvnews.ca/london/article/legionnaires-outbreak-in-london-ends-after-70-cases-3-deaths/">(CFPL-DT)</a></li></ul>
<p><b>International relations</b> 
</p>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/India%E2%80%93United_States_relations" title="IndiaUnited States relations">IndiaUnited States relations</a>, <a href="/wiki/Tariffs_in_the_second_Trump_administration" title="Tariffs in the second Trump administration">Tariffs in the second Trump administration</a>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/President_of_the_United_States" title="President of the United States">U.S. president</a> <a href="/wiki/Donald_Trump" title="Donald Trump">Donald Trump</a> issues an <a href="/wiki/List_of_executive_orders_in_the_second_presidency_of_Donald_Trump" title="List of executive orders in the second presidency of Donald Trump">executive order</a> raising the total tariff on <a href="/wiki/India" title="India">Indian</a> imports to the United States to 50%, with an additional 25% that will take effect 21 days after August 7 due to its purchases of <a href="/wiki/Russia" title="Russia">Russian</a> oil. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.bbc.com/news/articles/c1dxr1g4y7yo">(BBC News)</a></li></ul></li></ul>
<p><b>Law and crime</b>
</p>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/2025_Fort_Stewart_shooting" title="2025 Fort Stewart shooting">2025 Fort Stewart shooting</a>
<ul><li>Five people are injured in a <a href="/wiki/Mass_shooting" title="Mass shooting">mass shooting</a> at the <a href="/wiki/Fort_Stewart" title="Fort Stewart">Fort Stewart</a> army post near <a href="/wiki/Savannah,_Georgia" title="Savannah, Georgia">Savannah</a>, <a href="/wiki/Georgia_(U.S._state)" title="Georgia (U.S. state)">Georgia</a>, <a href="/wiki/United_States" title="United States">United States</a>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://apnews.com/article/georgia-army-post-lockdown-shooter-0b3b2cda384d1f33d107d988e6088d92">(AP)</a></li></ul></li>
<li>Former <a href="/wiki/South_Korea" title="South Korea">South Korean</a> <a href="/wiki/First_Lady_of_South_Korea" title="First Lady of South Korea">first lady</a> <a href="/wiki/Kim_Keon_Hee" title="Kim Keon Hee">Kim Keon Hee</a> appears for questioning by a special prosecutor in central <a href="/wiki/Seoul" title="Seoul">Seoul</a>. The investigation concerns allegations of stock manipulation, bribery, and interference in <a href="/wiki/People_Power_Party" title="People Power Party">People Power Party</a> nominations. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://apnews.com/article/south-korea-yoon-kim-keon-hee-corruption-south-korea-43901f4511112c9ca0a158afb832be4f">(AP)</a></li></ul>
<p><b>Politics and elections</b>
</p>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/2025_Polish_presidential_election" title="2025 Polish presidential election">2025 Polish presidential election</a>
<ul><li>Former <a href="/wiki/Institute_of_National_Remembrance" title="Institute of National Remembrance">Institute of National Remembrance</a> chairman <a href="/wiki/Karol_Nawrocki" title="Karol Nawrocki">Karol Nawrocki</a> is sworn in as the new <a href="/wiki/President_of_Poland" title="President of Poland">president of Poland</a>, succeeding <a href="/wiki/Andrzej_Duda" title="Andrzej Duda">Andrzej Duda</a>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://edition.cnn.com/2025/08/06/europe/poland-president-nawrocki-sworn-in-intl">(CNN)</a></li></ul></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Impeachment_of_Sara_Duterte" title="Impeachment of Sara Duterte">Impeachment of Sara Duterte</a>
<ul><li>The <a href="/wiki/Philippine_Senate" class="mw-redirect" title="Philippine Senate">Philippine Senate</a> votes 1941 to dismiss the <a href="/wiki/Impeachment_in_the_Philippines" title="Impeachment in the Philippines">impeachment complaint</a> against <a href="/wiki/Vice_President_of_the_Philippines" title="Vice President of the Philippines">Vice President</a> <a href="/wiki/Sara_Duterte" title="Sara Duterte">Sara Duterte</a>, following a <a href="/wiki/Supreme_Court_of_the_Philippines" title="Supreme Court of the Philippines">Supreme Court</a> ruling that declared the complaint <a href="/wiki/Constitution_of_the_Philippines" title="Constitution of the Philippines">unconstitutional</a>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2025-08-06/majority-of-philippine-senators-shelve-duterte-impeachment-case">(Bloomberg)</a></li></ul></li></ul>
<p><b>Science and technology</b>
</p>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Strait_of_Messina_Bridge" title="Strait of Messina Bridge">Strait of Messina Bridge</a>
<ul><li>The <a href="/wiki/Government_of_Italy" title="Government of Italy">Italian government</a> authorizes a construction project for a bridge over the <a href="/wiki/Strait_of_Messina" title="Strait of Messina">Strait of Messina</a> to connect <a href="/wiki/Sicily" title="Sicily">Sicily</a> with mainland <a href="/wiki/Italy" title="Italy">Italy</a>. The project will be the longest <a href="/wiki/Suspension_bridge" title="Suspension bridge">suspension bridge</a> in the world by the time of its completion in 2032 or 2033. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://apnews.com/article/italy-messina-bridge-sicily-calabria-meloni-nato-1a19e957e303c46ff51214d54a2dc6d7">(AP)</a> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.politico.eu/article/italy-gets-final-approval-for-e13-5b-sicily-bridge-project/">(Politico EU)</a></li></ul></li></ul></div></div></div>
<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1248507241"><div class="current-events"><div id="2025_August_05"></div>
<div role="region" aria-label="August 5" id="2025_August_5" class="current-events-main vevent">
    <div class="current-events-heading plainlinks">
        <div class="current-events-title" role="heading"><span class="summary">August 5, 2025<span style="display: none;"> (<span class="bday dtstart published updated itvstart">2025-08-05</span>)</span> (Tuesday)</span>
        </div>
        <ul class="current-events-navbar editlink noprint"><li><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Portal:Current_events/2025_August_5&action=edit&editintro=Portal:Current_events/Edit_instructions">edit</a></li><li><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Portal:Current_events/2025_August_5&action=history">history</a></li><li><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Portal:Current_events/2025_August_5&action=watch">watch</a></li>
        </ul>
    </div>
    <div class="current-events-content description">
<p><b>Armed conflicts and attacks</b>
</p>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Russian_invasion_of_Ukraine" title="Russian invasion of Ukraine">Russian invasion of Ukraine</a>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Russian_strikes_against_Ukrainian_infrastructure_(2022%E2%80%93present)" title="Russian strikes against Ukrainian infrastructure (2022present)">Russian strikes against Ukrainian infrastructure</a>
<ul><li>A series of <a href="/wiki/Russia" title="Russia">Russian</a> strikes targeting <a href="/wiki/Ukraine" title="Ukraine">Ukraine</a>'s <a href="/wiki/Zaporizhzhia_Oblast" title="Zaporizhzhia Oblast">Zaporizhzhia</a>, <a href="/wiki/Kharkiv_Oblast" title="Kharkiv Oblast">Kharkiv</a>, <a href="/wiki/Odesa_Oblast" title="Odesa Oblast">Odesa</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Sumy_Oblast" title="Sumy Oblast">Sumy Oblasts</a> kills at least five people and injures 13 others. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.euronews.com/my-europe/2025/08/05/at-least-five-killed-in-intense-russian-strikes-hit-kharkiv-and-zaporizhzhia-regions">(Euronews)</a></li></ul></li></ul></li></ul>
<p><b>Disasters and accidents</b>
</p>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/2025_Uttarakhand_flash_flood" title="2025 Uttarakhand flash flood">2025 Uttarakhand flash flood</a>
<ul><li>At least four people are killed and around 100 others are reported missing after a massive <a href="/wiki/Cloudburst" title="Cloudburst">cloudburst</a> triggers <a href="/wiki/Flash_flood" title="Flash flood">flash floods</a> in Dharali village, <a href="/wiki/Uttarkashi_district" title="Uttarkashi district">Uttarkashi</a>, <a href="/wiki/Uttarakhand" title="Uttarakhand">Uttarakhand</a>, <a href="/wiki/India" title="India">India</a>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.news18.com/amp/india/uttarkashi-flash-flood-sdrf-ndrf-deployed-after-cloudburst-in-dharali-many-feared-trapped-9485812.html">(NDTV)</a>  <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.hindustantimes.com/india-news/uttarkashi-cloudburst-live-updates-uttarakhand-flashflood-dharali-cloud-burst-rescue-harsil-missing-dead-army-101754386714845.html?id=101754413436226&utm_source=ht_site_copyURL&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=ht_site">(<i>Hindustan Times</i>)</a></li></ul></li>
<li>Four people are killed when a civil protection surveillance <a href="/wiki/Zl%C3%ADn_Z_43" title="Zln Z 43">Safir-43</a> aircraft crashes during a training mission at <a href="/wiki/Jijel_Ferhat_Abbas_Airport" title="Jijel Ferhat Abbas Airport">Jijel Ferhat Abbas Airport</a> near <a href="/wiki/Jijel" title="Jijel">Jijel</a>, <a href="/wiki/Algeria" title="Algeria">Algeria</a>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://indianexpress.com/article/world/4-people-killed-in-plane-crash-at-algerian-airport-10171926/">(<i>The Indian Express</i>)</a> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://asn.flightsafety.org/wikibase/534529">(ASN)</a></li>
<li>Four people are killed when a medical transport <a href="/wiki/Beechcraft_Super_King_Air" title="Beechcraft Super King Air">Beechcraft Super King Air</a> small plane crashes near <a href="/wiki/Chinle_Municipal_Airport" title="Chinle Municipal Airport">Chinle Municipal Airport</a> in <a href="/wiki/Chinle,_Arizona" title="Chinle, Arizona">Chinle</a>, <a href="/wiki/Arizona" title="Arizona">Arizona</a>, <a href="/wiki/United_States" title="United States">United States</a>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.koat.com/article/arizona-deadly-airplane-crash-chinle/65607971">(KOAT-TV)</a></li></ul>
<p><b>International relations</b>
</p>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Australia%E2%80%93Japan_relations" title="AustraliaJapan relations">AustraliaJapan relations</a>, <a href="/wiki/Australian_general_purpose_frigate_program" title="Australian general purpose frigate program">Australian general purpose frigate program</a>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Australia" title="Australia">Australian</a> <a href="/wiki/Minister_for_Defence_(Australia)" title="Minister for Defence (Australia)">defence minister</a> <a href="/wiki/Richard_Marles" title="Richard Marles">Richard Marles</a> announces that the country will purchase eleven <a href="/wiki/Mogami-class_frigate" title="Mogami-class frigate"><i>Mogami</i>-class frigates</a> from <a href="/wiki/Mitsubishi_Heavy_Industries" title="Mitsubishi Heavy Industries">Mitsubishi Heavy Industries</a> to upgrade its <a href="/wiki/Australian_Navy" class="mw-redirect" title="Australian Navy">Navy</a> as the <a href="/wiki/New_FFM" title="New FFM">New FFM</a>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.dw.com/en/australia-to-buy-11-advanced-warships-from-japan/a-73528732">(DW)</a></li></ul></li></ul>
<p><b>Law and crime</b>
</p>
<ul><li>A court in <a href="/wiki/Chi%C8%99in%C4%83u" title="Chiinu">Chiinu</a> sentences the <a href="/wiki/Governor_of_Gagauzia" title="Governor of Gagauzia">governor</a> of <a href="/wiki/Moldova" title="Moldova">Moldova</a>'s autonomous <a href="/wiki/Gagauzia" title="Gagauzia">Gagauzia</a> region, <a href="/wiki/Evghenia_Gu%C8%9Bul" title="Evghenia Guul">Evghenia Guul</a>, to seven years in prison for violations related to the financing of the banned opposition <a href="/wiki/%C8%98or_Party" title="or Party">or Party</a>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/moldovan-regional-leader-jailed-aiding-russian-meddling-2025-08-05/">(Reuters)</a> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://caliber.az/en/post/moldova-jails-gagauzia-governor-for-7-years">(Caliber)</a></li></ul>
<p><b>Politics and elections</b>
</p>
<ul><li>Former <a href="/wiki/Ministry_of_Finance_(Lithuania)" title="Ministry of Finance (Lithuania)">finance minister</a> <a href="/wiki/Rimantas_%C5%A0ad%C5%BEius" title="Rimantas adius">Rimantas adius</a> is appointed acting <a href="/wiki/Prime_Minister_of_Lithuania" title="Prime Minister of Lithuania">Prime Minister of Lithuania</a> following the collapse of the <a href="/wiki/Paluckas_Cabinet" title="Paluckas Cabinet">Paluckas government</a>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.politico.eu/article/lithuania-government-resigns-rimantas-sadzius-new-caretaker/">(Politico)</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Nestor_Ntahontuye" title="Nestor Ntahontuye">Nestor Ntahontuye</a> is appointed the new <a href="/wiki/Prime_minister_of_Burundi" class="mw-redirect" title="Prime minister of Burundi">prime minister of Burundi</a>, succeeding <a href="/wiki/Gervais_Ndirakobuca" title="Gervais Ndirakobuca">Gervais Ndirakobuca</a>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.burunditimes.com/ndayishimiye-appoints-new-prime-minister-and-ministers-in-burundi/">(<i>Burundi Times</i>)</a></li></ul></div></div></div>

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
Worldwide current events
Sports events
Recent deaths
Entry views by week list
Today's most viewed articles
Topics in the news
Jim Lovell in 1969
American astronaut Jim Lovell (pictured) dies at the age of 97.
A helicopter crashes in Ashanti Region, Ghana, killing all on board, including two current ministers (Edward Omane Boamah and Ibrahim Murtala Muhammed).
In cycling, Pauline Ferrand-Prvot wins the Tour de France Femmes.
In association football, the Copa Amrica Femenina concludes with Brazil defeating Colombia in the final.

Armed conflicts and attacks

Gaza war
Israeli invasion of the Gaza Strip
Seven people are killed, including five Al Jazeera journalists and cameramen in an Israeli strike near the Al-Shifa Hospital in Gaza City. (BBC News) (Al Jazeera)

Disasters and accidents

2025 Balkesir earthquake
A Mww 6.1 earthquake strikes western Turkey, killing one person, injuring 35 others, trapping several and causing at least 16 building and two mosque minaret collapses in Balkesir Province and Manisa. (CNN Turkiye) (TRT Haber)
Six people are killed, including four children, in a two-alarm fire at a house in Waldorf, Maryland, United States. (WJZ-TV)
Four people are killed and sixteen others are injured due to a vehicle collision on the BR-452 highway in Uberlndia, Minas Gerais, Brazil. (G1 Globo)
More than 600 pilgrims in Baghdad, Iraq, are hospitalised with respiratory problems after inhaling chlorine as the result of a leak at a water treatment station. (MSN)

International relations

RussiaUnited States relations, Peace negotiations in the Russian invasion of Ukraine
U.S. president Donald Trump announces that he will be meeting Russian president Vladimir Putin in Alaska, United States, for talks on August 15 to discuss ending the war in Ukraine. (The Atlantic) (BBC News)

Law and crime

Eight people are killed and three others are injured in a mass shooting at a nightclub in Santa Luca Canton, Guayas Province, Ecuador. (AP)
August9,2025 (Saturday)
edit
history
watch

Disasters and accidents

At least six Lebanese soldiers are killed in an explosion as troops were removing munitions from a Hezbollah facility near the Israeli border. (Al Arabiya)

International relations

Atomic bombings of Hiroshima and Nagasaki
In commemoration of the 80th anniversary of the atomic bombings of Hiroshima and Nagasaki, the twin bells of Urakami Cathedral, that were destroyed, are restored in Nagasaki. The anniversary is attended by about 2,600 people, including foreign dignitaries and survivors of the bombings. (AP) (CBC) (Sky News)
Foreign relations of Singapore
Multiple national leaders attend celebrations of the 60th anniversary of Singaporean independence, including President of Indonesia Prabowo Subianto and Sultan of Brunei Hassanal Bolkiah. (Al Jazeera) (The Jakarta Post) (The Star)

Law and crime

Haitian crisis
The Haitian Government announces a three-month state of emergency in the central and western regions of Haiti aiming to curb hunger and gang violence in the regions. (Al Jazeera) (AP)
Two people are killed and five others are injured in a drive-by mass shooting in a busy area in Nassau, The Bahamas. (The Nassau Guardian)
Metropolitan Police carry out the largest mass detainments in London's history, detaining at least 466 people for peacefully protesting the UKs ban on the pro-Palestine activist network Palestine Action. Protesters gathered in Parliament Square to denounce the Israeli invasion of Gaza and the criminalisation of support for Palestine Action, with many holding signs reading I oppose genocide, I support Palestine Action before being forcibly removed by police. (Al Jazeera)
Former Chadian prime minister and leader of the Les Transformateurs party Succs Masra is sentenced to 20 years in prison and fined F.CFA 1 billion (US$1,775,200) after being convicted of disseminating racist and xenophobic messages that incited violence, a verdict his legal team plans to appeal. (Reuters)
August8,2025 (Friday)
edit
history
watch

Armed conflicts and attacks

Gaza war
Israeli invasion of the Gaza Strip, Israeli reoccupation of the Gaza Strip
The Israeli Security Cabinet approves Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's plan to capture Gaza City with the stated objective of defeating Hamas, while supposedly ensuring the provision of humanitarian aid to civilians outside the areas of combat. (Bloomberg)
Germany announces it will halt weapon shipments to Israel that could be used in Gaza "until further notice" in light of Israel's plan to fully militarily occupy Gaza. (AP)
The Israel Defense Forces begins massing troops and tanks on the border with Gaza ahead of an expected major ground offensive. (The Times of India)
Kivu conflict
M23 campaign
Volker Trk, the UN high commissioner for human rights, reports that M23 rebels have killed over 319 civilians in July. M23 president Bertrand Bisimwa said the group would investigate the claim. (Al Jazeera) (Reuters)
Insurgency in Balochistan
At least 33 Pakistani Taliban militants are killed in an overnight operation near the Afghanistan border in Zhob, Balochistan, Pakistan. (CTV News)
War on drugs
U.S. president Donald Trump signs an executive order commanding the U.S. military and other sectors of the federal government to take action against Latin American drug cartels designated as terrorist organisations, such as Tren de Aragua and MS-13. (Al Jazeera) (The New York Times)

Disasters and accidents

A bus carrying mourners back home from a funeral in Kisumu, Kenya, overturns and plunges into a ditch, killing at least 21 people. (MSN)
A bus and a truck collide head-on in Mato Grosso, Brazil, killing 11 people and injuring 45 others. (Reuters)
Flash floods kill at least 22 people and leave two dozen others missing in Gansu province, China. (MSN)
At least 30 people are injured when a passenger train derails on the KermanZarand railway path in Kerman province, Iran. (The Express Tribune)
A fire breaks out at the MosqueCathedral of Crdoba, a UNESCO World Heritage Site in Andalusia, Spain, due to a short circuit. The roof of a chapel collapses, but the fire is extinguished with no further damage. (The Guardian) (El Pas)

International relations

ArmeniaAzerbaijan relations
ArmeniaAzerbaijan peace agreement
The leaders of Armenia and Azerbaijan plan to sign a joint declaration at the White House in Washington, D.C., United States, committing to a peace deal facilitated by the Trump administration that would end nearly four decades of conflict between the two countries. (CNN)
Armenia agrees to grant the U.S. exclusive development rights in the Zangezur corridor for 99 years. The U.S. would sublease to a consortium to develop rail, oil, gas, and fiber optic lines along the 27-mile (43km) corridor. (Politico)

Law and crime

2025 Anaconda shooting
The suspected perpetrator of the bar shooting that killed four people last week in Anaconda, Montana, United States, is arrested. (KRTV-TV)
2024 South Korean martial law crisis
The Seoul Central District Court rejects a petition brought by former interior minister Lee Sang-min regarding the arrest warrant against him over his alleged involvement in former president Yoon Suk Yeol's martial law attempt on December 3, 2024. (The Korea Times)
A police officer and the perpetrator are killed, and another officer suffers non-life-threatening injuries, in a shooting at the CDC building near Emory University in Atlanta, Georgia, United States. (CNN) (WAGA-TV)
The Uganda High Court denies bail to opposition figure Kizza Besigye, who faces treason charges, ruling that the 180-day period for mandatory release began when his case was transferred to a civilian court in February, leaving him 12 days short of eligibility. (Reuters)
Portugal's Constitutional Court blocks a parliamentary bill that would require most legally resident immigrants to wait two years before applying for family reunification, ruling that it violates constitutional protections for family unity. (Reuters)
August7,2025 (Thursday)
edit
history
watch

Armed conflicts and attacks

Kivu conflict
M23 campaign
M23 rebels attack Wazalendo militia Decisive Movement for the Liberation of Congo positions in Kamakombe and Kasheke, Democratic Republic of the Congo. (Radio Okapi)

Business and economy

The Egyptian government signs a $35bn deal to import 130 billion cubic metres of gas from Israel's Leviathan gas field which will remain in effect until 2040, despite the Israeli invasion of Gaza. (Middle East Eye)

Disasters and accidents

At least eight people are killed and several others are injured when a train and a Kenya Pipeline-owned bus collide on a level crossing in Naivasha, Nakuru County, Kenya. (Daily Nation)
At least six people are killed and two others are injured when an air ambulance crashes into a residential area in Mwihoko, Kiambu County, Kenya. (AP) (Al Jazeera)
Five people are killed and several are injured when a malfunctioning gas cylinder explodes in Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh, India. (MSN)
Two people are killed when a helicopter crashes into an unmanned barge on the Mississippi River near East Alton, Illinois, United States. (AP)

International relations

United StatesVenezuela relations
U.S. attorney general Pam Bondi announces a $50 million reward for information leading to the arrest of Venezuelan president Nicols Maduro, saying his capture and extradition to the United States is vital for national security. (BBC News)

Law and crime

Mass shootings in the United States
Two people are killed and three others are injured, including two state troopers, in a mass shooting when a man kills his neighbor and opens fire on law enforcement before being killed in Thompson Township, Susquehanna County, Pennsylvania, United States. (BBC News) (WHP-TV)

Politics and elections

British Parliamentary Under-Secretary of State for Housing and Homelessness Rushanara Ali resigns amid controversy over increasing the rent at a property she owns in east London by 700 in order to force the tenants to move. (BBC News)
The cabinet of Lebanon approves a U.S. proposal for disarming Hezbollah by the end of the year, along with ending Israel's occupation in the country, despite Hezbollah's rejection of this demand. (Al Jazeera)

Science and technology

OpenAI releases ChatGPT-5 with "PhD-level intelligence" to the general public. (The Guardian)
August6,2025 (Wednesday)
edit
history
watch

Armed conflicts and attacks

Sudanese civil war
2025 alleged shootdown of UAE mercenary plane
The Sudanese Armed Forces claims that it shot down an Emirati plane carrying mercenaries near Nyala, South Darfur, Sudan, allegedly killing at least 40 people. (France 24)

Disasters and accidents

2025 European and Mediterranean wildfires
One person is killed, thirteen people are injured and one person is missing after a wildfire breaks out in Aude department, France, also burning at least 16,000 hectares of land. (BBC News) (DW)
Over 1,500 people are evacuated from a resort in Tarifa, Andalusia, Spain, after a wildfire breaks out in Campo de Gibraltar. (Le Monde) (Europa Sur)
2025 Ghanaian Air Force Z-9 helicopter crash
A Ghana Air Force Z-9 helicopter crashes near Obuasi, Ashanti Region, Ghana, killing eight people, including defence minister Edward Omane Boamah, environment and science minister Ibrahim Murtala Muhammed, and regional minister Samuel Sarpong. (BBC News)
Gaza Strip famine
A truck carrying humanitarian aid overturns on civilians near the Nuseirat refugee camp in the Gaza Strip, killing at least 25 people and injuring dozens of others. (Anadolu Agency) (The Guardian)
Twelve people are killed and 13 others are injured after a dump truck plunges into a ravine in Lebak, Sultan Kudarat, near the provincial boundary with Maguindanao del Sur in the Philippines. (ABS-CBN News) (Manila Bulletin)
Five people are killed and 24 others are injured when a suspension bridge deck tilts at a scenic spot in Zhaosu County, Ili Kazakh Autonomous Prefecture, Xinjiang, China. (China Daily)

Health and environment

A month-long legionnaires' disease outbreak that started on July 8 in London, Ontario, Canada, ends after 70 cases and three deaths. (CFPL-DT)

International relations

IndiaUnited States relations, Tariffs in the second Trump administration
U.S. president Donald Trump issues an executive order raising the total tariff on Indian imports to the United States to 50%, with an additional 25% that will take effect 21 days after August 7 due to its purchases of Russian oil. (BBC News)

Law and crime

2025 Fort Stewart shooting
Five people are injured in a mass shooting at the Fort Stewart army post near Savannah, Georgia, United States. (AP)
Former South Korean first lady Kim Keon Hee appears for questioning by a special prosecutor in central Seoul. The investigation concerns allegations of stock manipulation, bribery, and interference in People Power Party nominations. (AP)

Politics and elections

2025 Polish presidential election
Former Institute of National Remembrance chairman Karol Nawrocki is sworn in as the new president of Poland, succeeding Andrzej Duda. (CNN)
Impeachment of Sara Duterte
The Philippine Senate votes 1941 to dismiss the impeachment complaint against Vice President Sara Duterte, following a Supreme Court ruling that declared the complaint unconstitutional. (Bloomberg)

Science and technology

Strait of Messina Bridge
The Italian government authorizes a construction project for a bridge over the Strait of Messina to connect Sicily with mainland Italy. The project will be the longest suspension bridge in the world by the time of its completion in 2032 or 2033. (AP) (Politico EU)
August5,2025 (Tuesday)
edit
history
watch

Armed conflicts and attacks

Russian invasion of Ukraine
Russian strikes against Ukrainian infrastructure
A series of Russian strikes targeting Ukraine's Zaporizhzhia, Kharkiv, Odesa, and Sumy Oblasts kills at least five people and injures 13 others. (Euronews)

Disasters and accidents

2025 Uttarakhand flash flood
At least four people are killed and around 100 others are reported missing after a massive cloudburst triggers flash floods in Dharali village, Uttarkashi, Uttarakhand, India. (NDTV) (Hindustan Times)
Four people are killed when a civil protection surveillance Safir-43 aircraft crashes during a training mission at Jijel Ferhat Abbas Airport near Jijel, Algeria. (The Indian Express) (ASN)
Four people are killed when a medical transport Beechcraft Super King Air small plane crashes near Chinle Municipal Airport in Chinle, Arizona, United States. (KOAT-TV)

International relations

AustraliaJapan relations, Australian general purpose frigate program
Australian defence minister Richard Marles announces that the country will purchase eleven Mogami-class frigates from Mitsubishi Heavy Industries to upgrade its Navy as the New FFM. (DW)

Law and crime

A court in Chiinu sentences the governor of Moldova's autonomous Gagauzia region, Evghenia Guul, to seven years in prison for violations related to the financing of the banned opposition or Party. (Reuters) (Caliber)

Politics and elections

Former finance minister Rimantas adius is appointed acting Prime Minister of Lithuania following the collapse of the Paluckas government. (Politico)
Nestor Ntahontuye is appointed the new prime minister of Burundi, succeeding Gervais Ndirakobuca. (Burundi Times)
